text: Ozerkovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Naumovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 28 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 24 km from Sterlitamak, 14 km from Naumovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Ozerkovka
